verses.verse: Then the word <S%H1697><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> came to Yehu <S%H3058><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Hanani <S%H2607><s%> against Baasha <S%H1201><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>,

Forasmuch as I exalted <S%H7311><s%> <S%H8689><s%> thee out of the dust <S%H6083><s%>, and made <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8799><s%> thee prince <S%H5057><s%> over my people <S%H5971><s%> Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>; and thou hast walked <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8799><s%> in the way <S%H1870><s%> of Yarov`am <S%H3379><s%>, and hast made my people <S%H5971><s%> Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> to sin <S%H2398><s%> <S%H8686><s%>, to provoke me to anger <S%H3707><s%> <S%H8687><s%> with their sins <S%H2403><s%>;

Behold, I will take away <S%H1197><s%> <S%H8686><s%> the posterity <S%H310><s%> of Baasha <S%H1201><s%>, and the posterity <S%H310><s%> of his house <S%H1004><s%>; and will make <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> thy house <S%H1004><s%> like the house <S%H1004><s%> of Yarov`am <S%H3379><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Nebat <S%H5028><s%>.

Him that dieth <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8801><s%> of Baasha <S%H1201><s%> in the city <S%H5892><s%> shall the dogs <S%H3611><s%> eat <S%H398><s%> <S%H8799><s%>; and him that dieth <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8801><s%> of his in the fields <S%H7704><s%> shall the fowls <S%H5775><s%> of the air <S%H8064><s%> eat <S%H398><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.

Now the rest <S%H3499><s%> of the acts <S%H1697><s%> of Baasha <S%H1201><s%>, and what he did <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, and his might <S%H1369><s%>, are they not written <S%H3789><s%> <S%H8803><s%> in the book <S%H5612><s%> of the chronicles <S%H1697><s%> <S%H3117><s%> of the kings <S%H4428><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> ?

So Baasha <S%H1201><s%> slept <S%H7901><s%> <S%H8799><s%> with his fathers <S%H1><s%>, and was buried <S%H6912><s%> <S%H8735><s%> in Tirzah <S%H8656><s%>: and Elah <S%H425><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%> reigned <S%H4427><s%> <S%H8799><s%> in his stead.

And also by the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the prophet <S%H5030><s%> Yehu <S%H3058><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Hanani <S%H2607><s%> came the word <S%H1697><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> against Baasha <S%H1201><s%>, and against his house <S%H1004><s%>, even for all the evil <S%H7451><s%> that he did <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%>, in provoking him to anger <S%H3707><s%> <S%H8687><s%> with the work <S%H4639><s%> of his hands <S%H3027><s%>, in being like the house <S%H1004><s%> of Yarov`am <S%H3379><s%>; and because he killed <S%H5221><s%> <S%H8689><s%> him.

In the twenty <S%H6242><s%> <S%H8141><s%> and sixth <S%H8337><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> of Asa <S%H609><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Y'hudah <S%H3063><s%> began Elah <S%H425><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Baasha <S%H1201><s%> to reign <S%H4427><s%> <S%H8804><s%> over Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> in Tirzah <S%H8656><s%>, two years <S%H8141><s%>.

And his servant <S%H5650><s%> Zimri <S%H2174><s%>, captain <S%H8269><s%> of half <S%H4276><s%> his chariots <S%H7393><s%>, conspired <S%H7194><s%> <S%H8799><s%> against him, as he was in Tirzah <S%H8656><s%>, drinking <S%H8354><s%> <S%H8802><s%> himself drunk <S%H7910><s%> in the house <S%H1004><s%> of Arza <S%H777><s%> steward of his house <S%H1004><s%> in Tirzah <S%H8656><s%>.

And Zimri <S%H2174><s%> went in <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%> and smote <S%H5221><s%> <S%H8686><s%> him, and killed <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8686><s%> him, in the twenty <S%H6242><s%> and seventh <S%H7651><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> of Asa <S%H609><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Y'hudah <S%H3063><s%>, and reigned <S%H4427><s%> <S%H8799><s%> in his stead.

And it came to pass, when he began to reign <S%H4427><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, as soon as he sat <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8800><s%> on his throne <S%H3678><s%>, that he slew <S%H5221><s%> <S%H8689><s%> all the house <S%H1004><s%> of Baasha <S%H1201><s%>: he left <S%H7604><s%> <S%H8689><s%> him not one that pisseht <S%H8366><s%> <S%H8688><s%> against a wall <S%H7023><s%>, neither of his kinsfolks <S%H1350><s%> <S%H8802><s%>, nor of his friends <S%H7453><s%>.

Thus did Zimri <S%H2174><s%> destroy <S%H8045><s%> <S%H8686><s%> all the house <S%H1004><s%> of Baasha <S%H1201><s%>, according to the word <S%H1697><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%>, which he spake <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8765><s%> against Baasha <S%H1201><s%> by <S%H3027><s%> Yehu <S%H3058><s%> the prophet <S%H5030><s%>,

For all the sins <S%H2403><s%> of Baasha <S%H1201><s%>, and the sins <S%H2403><s%> of Elah <S%H425><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%>, by which they sinned <S%H2398><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, and by which they made Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> to sin <S%H2398><s%> <S%H8689><s%>, in provoking the YY <S%H3068><s%> 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> to anger <S%H3707><s%> <S%H8687><s%> with their vanities <S%H1892><s%>.

Now the rest <S%H3499><s%> of the acts <S%H1697><s%> of Elah <S%H425><s%>, and all that he did <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, are they not written <S%H3789><s%> <S%H8803><s%> in the book <S%H5612><s%> of the chronicles <S%H1697><s%> <S%H3117><s%> of the kings <S%H4428><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> ?

In the twenty <S%H6242><s%> <S%H8141><s%> and seventh <S%H7651><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> of Asa <S%H609><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Y'hudah <S%H3063><s%> did Zimri <S%H2174><s%> reign <S%H4427><s%> <S%H8804><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> in Tirzah <S%H8656><s%>. And the people <S%H5971><s%> were encamped <S%H2583><s%> <S%H8802><s%> against Gibbethon <S%H1405><s%>, which belonged to the Philistines <S%H6430><s%>.

And the people <S%H5971><s%> that were encamped <S%H2583><s%> <S%H8802><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8799><s%> say <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, Zimri <S%H2174><s%> hath conspired <S%H7194><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, and hath also slain <S%H5221><s%> <S%H8689><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%>: wherefore all Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> made Omri <S%H6018><s%>, the captain <S%H8269><s%> of the host <S%H6635><s%>, king <S%H4427><s%> <S%H8686><s%> over Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> that day <S%H3117><s%> in the camp <S%H4264><s%>.
And Omri <S%H6018><s%> went up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8799><s%> from Gibbethon <S%H1405><s%>, and all Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> with him, and they besieged <S%H6696><s%> <S%H8799><s%> Tirzah <S%H8656><s%>.

And it came to pass, when Zimri <S%H2174><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8800><s%> that the city <S%H5892><s%> was taken <S%H3920><s%> <S%H8738><s%>, that he went <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%> into the palace <S%H759><s%> of the king's <S%H4428><s%> house <S%H1004><s%>, and burnt <S%H8313><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the king's <S%H4428><s%> house <S%H1004><s%> over him with fire <S%H784><s%>, and died <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8799><s%>,

For his sins <S%H2403><s%> which he sinned <S%H2398><s%> <S%H8804><s%> in doing <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8800><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%>, in walking <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8800><s%> in the way <S%H1870><s%> of Yarov`am <S%H3379><s%>, and in his sin <S%H2403><s%> which he did <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, to make Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> to sin <S%H2398><s%> <S%H8687><s%>.

Now the rest <S%H3499><s%> of the acts <S%H1697><s%> of Zimri <S%H2174><s%>, and his treason <S%H7195><s%> that he wrought <S%H7194><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, are they not written <S%H3789><s%> <S%H8803><s%> in the book <S%H5612><s%> of the chronicles <S%H1697><s%> <S%H3117><s%> of the kings <S%H4428><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> ?

Then were the people <S%H5971><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> divided <S%H2505><s%> <S%H8735><s%> into two parts <S%H2677><s%>: half <S%H2677><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%> followed <S%H1961><s%> <S%H8804><s%> <S%H310><s%> Tibni <S%H8402><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ginath <S%H1527><s%>, to make him king <S%H4427><s%> <S%H8687><s%>; and half <S%H2677><s%> followed <S%H310><s%> Omri <S%H6018><s%>.

But the people <S%H5971><s%> that followed <S%H310><s%> Omri <S%H6018><s%> prevailed <S%H2388><s%> <S%H8799><s%> against <S%H854><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> that followed <S%H310><s%> Tibni <S%H8402><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ginath <S%H1527><s%>: so Tibni <S%H8402><s%> died <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and Omri <S%H6018><s%> reigned <S%H4427><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.

In the thirty <S%H7970><s%> <S%H8141><s%> and first <S%H259><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> of Asa <S%H609><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Y'hudah <S%H3063><s%> began Omri <S%H6018><s%> to reign <S%H4427><s%> <S%H8804><s%> over Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, twelve <S%H8147><s%> <S%H6240><s%> years <S%H8141><s%>: six <S%H8337><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> reigned <S%H4427><s%> <S%H8804><s%> he in Tirzah <S%H8656><s%>.

And he bought <S%H7069><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the hill <S%H2022><s%> SHomron <S%H8111><s%> of Shemer <S%H8106><s%> for two talents <S%H3603><s%> of silver <S%H3701><s%>, and built <S%H1129><s%> <S%H8799><s%> on the hill <S%H2022><s%>, and called <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of the city <S%H5892><s%> which he built <S%H1129><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, after the name <S%H8034><s%> of Shemer <S%H8106><s%>, owner <S%H113><s%> of the hill <S%H2022><s%>, SHomron <S%H8111><s%>.

But Omri <S%H6018><s%> wrought <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%> in the eyes <S%H5869><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%>, and did worse <S%H7489><s%> <S%H8686><s%> than all that were before <S%H6440><s%> him.

For he walked <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8799><s%> in all the way <S%H1870><s%> of Yarov`am <S%H3379><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Nebat <S%H5028><s%>, and in his sin <S%H2403><s%> wherewith he made Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> to sin <S%H2398><s%> <S%H8689><s%>, to provoke the YY <S%H3068><s%> 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> to anger <S%H3707><s%> <S%H8687><s%> with their vanities <S%H1892><s%>.

Now the rest <S%H3499><s%> of the acts <S%H1697><s%> of Omri <S%H6018><s%> which he did <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, and his might <S%H1369><s%> that he shewed <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, are they not written <S%H3789><s%> <S%H8803><s%> in the book <S%H5612><s%> of the chronicles <S%H1697><s%> <S%H3117><s%> of the kings <S%H4428><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> ?

So Omri <S%H6018><s%> slept <S%H7901><s%> <S%H8799><s%> with his fathers <S%H1><s%>, and was buried <S%H6912><s%> <S%H8735><s%> in SHomron <S%H8111><s%>: and Ach'av <S%H256><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%> reigned <S%H4427><s%> <S%H8799><s%> in his stead.

And in the thirty <S%H7970><s%> <S%H8141><s%> and eighth <S%H8083><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> of Asa <S%H609><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Y'hudah <S%H3063><s%> began Ach'av <S%H256><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Omri <S%H6018><s%> to reign <S%H4427><s%> <S%H8804><s%> over Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>: and Ach'av <S%H256><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Omri <S%H6018><s%> reigned <S%H4427><s%> <S%H8799><s%> over Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> in SHomron <S%H8111><s%> twenty <S%H6242><s%> and two <S%H8147><s%> years <S%H8141><s%>.

And Ach'av <S%H256><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Omri <S%H6018><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> above all that were before <S%H6440><s%> him.

And it came to pass, as if it had been a light thing <S%H7043><s%> <S%H8738><s%> for him to walk <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8800><s%> in the sins <S%H2403><s%> of Yarov`am <S%H3379><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Nebat <S%H5028><s%>, that he took <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to wife <S%H802><s%> Jezebel <S%H348><s%> the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Ethbaal <S%H856><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of the Zidonians <S%H6722><s%>, and went <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8799><s%> and served <S%H5647><s%> <S%H8799><s%> Baal <S%H1168><s%>, and worshipped <S%H7812><s%> <S%H8691><s%> him.

And he reared up <S%H6965><s%> <S%H8686><s%> an altar <S%H4196><s%> for Baal <S%H1168><s%> in the house <S%H1004><s%> of Baal <S%H1168><s%>, which he had built <S%H1129><s%> <S%H8804><s%> in SHomron <S%H8111><s%>.

And Ach'av <S%H256><s%> made <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> a grove <S%H842><s%>; and Ach'av <S%H256><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8800><s%> more <S%H3254><s%> <S%H8686><s%> to provoke the YY <S%H3068><s%> 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> to anger <S%H3707><s%> <S%H8687><s%> than all the kings <S%H4428><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> that were before <S%H6440><s%> him.

In his days <S%H3117><s%> did Hiel <S%H2419><s%> the Beit-Elite <S%H1017><s%> build <S%H1129><s%> <S%H8804><s%> Yericho <S%H3405><s%>: he laid the foundation <S%H3245><s%> <S%H8765><s%> thereof in Abiram <S%H48><s%> his firstborn <S%H1060><s%>, and set up <S%H5324><s%> <S%H8689><s%> the gates <S%H1817><s%> thereof in his youngest <S%H6810><s%> son Segub <S%H7687><s%>, according to the word <S%H1697><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%>, which he spake <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8765><s%> by <S%H3027><s%> Y'hoshuw`a <S%H3091><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Nun <S%H5126><s%>.
